title: Lord Peter: The Complete Lord Peter Wimsey Stories
description: An alternate cover edition can be found here.All 21 of Dorothy Sayers' short stories about Lord Peter Wimsey, eccentric amateur sleuth. Also includes an article about Sayers and a parody of "Gaudy Night". From "Lord Peter Views the Body" (1928)1. The Abominable History of the Man with Copper Fingers2.
